original_text: And thou shalt roast and eat it in the place which the Lord thy God shall choose: and thou shalt turn in the morning, and go unto thy tents.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 택하신 곳에서 그 고기를 구워 먹고 아침에 네 장막으로 돌아갈 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt roast and eat it
in the place which the Lord thy God shall choose
and thou shalt turn in the morning
